fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose one or two people to kidnap and roleblock at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Roleblock and Control Immunity
- Kidnapping a target swaps all visitors to them; for example, all visitors that visit target A will instead visit target B, and vice versa.
- If you only choose a single person to kidnap, you will swap them with yourself. Other than that, you can't directly target yourself.
- Your targets will think they were transported.
